Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ki asim tuhada sina (dila) tuhade la'i nahim' khol'ha dita hai
Ate tuhada uha bhara laha dita
Jisa ne tuhadi pitha jhuka diti si
Ate asim' tuhade nama nu uca kara dita
Tam aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Besaka aukha de nala saukha vi hai
Phira tusim vihale ho javo ate (badagi la'i) mihanata kari'a karo
Ate apane raba vala apana dhi'ana laga'u
